name: bi
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short for
bisexual : romantically or sexually attracted to people of your own gender and people of a different gender: When I was a teenager and came out to my parents, they said they already knew I was bi. His new boyfriend is bi, I think. Compare
pan adjective
More examplesFewer examplesThey are a bi activist and writer.This survey is not a representative sample of the bi community as a whole.She emphasizes that, even though she is in a long-term relationship with a man, she is still bi.For myself, I use the labels "bi" and "pan" interchangeably, but some people identify more with one or the other.
bi- prefix
(TWICE)
twice, or once every two: We meet bi-monthly (= twice every month or once every two months).

bi- prefix
(TWO)
having two: a biped (= an animal that walks on two legs) a biplane (= an old-fashioned aircraft with two wings)
